EmailTemplate.name: Data Services - Audix Unreachable
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Services - Audix Unreachable
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Data Services Unable to Reach You {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Contact.Name},
You left us a voicemail/email on [DATE], regarding {!Case.CaseNumber}. We tried to contact you regarding your inquiry, however we were unable to reach you over the phone.
We called on [DATE] at [PHONE NUMBER (XXX-XXX-XXXX)]
If you are looking for a status update, we recommend you visiting the Data Services Case Status Information Page. You will need the information you received from your Welcome, PIN emails to login and you can see where your case is during the recovery process.
You also can leave a message directly to the specialist working on your case or provide additional information.
Data Services responds to emails and/or voicemails, Monday through Friday between the hours of 6:00 AM to 4:00 PM PST.
The expected turnaround time of callback from Data Services is 2 Business hours.
Thank you, Intuit Data Services Data Services Case Status Information
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response.
